titleStmt.title: M. Judy et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG7475

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To his Excelency The Governor of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizen of Owen county would represent that at the late term of the Owen Circuit Court There was a fine of One thousand dollars and Six Months imprisonment assessed against William Steward for an asault and battery &c on one Jeptha Estes The offence was alledged to have been committed in the time of the late war and the leaders of the offence were carried on by Federal soldiers and the sd William Steward was pressed and made accompany the leaders to where the difficulty occured now we would respectfully represent that sd Steward when left to himself is peacible and quiet and is with all a very poor man and has a large and helpless family to support we feel in view of all the circumstances that the finding of the Court was heavy and hard and would respectfully request you to interpose and give such relief as you in your Judgment may think proper we would further represent that the sd William Steward had served as a private in the company of Captain Charles Rodgers ^of the federal army^ for Twelve Months and was honorably discharged and in conclusion we would say that there was no person hurt or property injured

M. Judy
James. W. Bridges
J L Moreland
Nathaniel Morgan
James Morgan,
Benj Perry
R H Read
Zamal Smith
John Perry
A. D. Moreland
J, W, Cassity
J A Jones
J H Wiley
Zenas Moreland
Robert Coalman
B. F. Wiley
Joel Moreland
Squire Robinson
John Mitchell
T. H. Moreland
T J Moreland
B L Moreland
H Bridges
Eliga Smith
G. B. Bramblet
B F mc daniel
A J mc Daniel
J, L, Honaker
A R. Mitchell
William Ellis
J C Emons
J C Emmons
John T Ruth
James Self
Z Corbin
D. B Powers
F. S Mathes

Owen Cir Ct
vs
Wm Steward
$1000. & 6 mos Imprisonment
Assault & Bat
Remit
2d Dec/65
